::Grounded's ship::
Groundeds ship being already fairly damaged as a result of the crash
is completly toaled with Wildriders shots...The computer goes down and
a spark ignites the ship and it goes up and a huge flume of fire and smoke

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Wildrider arrives at Grounded's ship, and transforms. (Gunthers, you
will
> want to post damage for your ship) as he whips out his gun, and lets
loose
> the same fire power he did on the navigator of this ship, just a few
> moments ago, kackling the whole way.
